name: Chamber of Excellence in International Affairs
headAddress: Tincani Street, no. 10, bl. F13, ap. 8, District 6
memberOrga:
Middle East Political and Economic Institute - http://mepei.com/
Energy Policy Group - https://www.enpg.ro/
goal:
The main aims of the Chamber of Excellence in International Affairs (CEIA) are:

• to promote the objective reality of the international politics;
• to shape the national security culture in the regional and international environment;
• to enhance the European values` presence in the Community and non-Community, both in public institutions and in the private sector;
• to stimulate the sustainable development of the Romanian society

In one sentence: Chamber of Excellence in International Affairs (CEIA) is a think-thank that promotes the objective reality of the international politics, while building a security culture with European core values.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Currently, CEIA is closely following the European Commission 's public policies on fake news and online disinformation.
